quest.name: Carrots: It's What's for Dinner
journal:
 Quest Sync
Yawningway needs help gathering the Carrotorium's Loporrits for mealtime.
objectives: With the chat mode in Say, enter “carrot of happiness” to call over the Loporrits.

dialogue.name: YAWNINGWAY
dialogue.text: Oh, bother... <yawn> There's no sign of any of them, and it's almost time to eat.

dialogue.name: YAWNINGWAY
dialogue.text: Mmm, you there... If you happen to be heading to the Carrotorium, could you let my fellows know it's mealtime? If we don't eat, I can't take my nap...

dialogue.name: YAWNINGWAY
dialogue.text: Many thanks... <yawn> They should come running at the mention of carrots of happiness, so just say those three magic words and they'll be on their way.

dialogue.name: YAWNINGWAY
dialogue.text: My friends aren't wont to refuse a well-prepared carrot─especially when it's a carrot of happiness. The mere mention should have them hopping back here in no time...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: carrot of happiness

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: With the chat mode in Say, use your keyboard or the software keyboard to enter any phrase containing the words “carrot of happiness” to call out to the Loporrit.

dialogue.name: LOPORRITSA04241
dialogue.text: Take the square root of the roots and you get...

dialogue.name: LOPORRITSA04241
dialogue.text: Carrots of happiness, you say? My, is it that time already?

dialogue.name: LOPORRITSA04241
dialogue.text: I was working out projections for optimal carrot production based on the total population of Etheirys to ensure that─ Oh, never mind. I must make haste, or I'll miss out on seconds!

dialogue.name: LOPORRITSB04241
dialogue.text: Oh my whiskers, a visitor from Etheirys! What do I do? What do I say? ...And have you brought any snacks?

dialogue.name: LOPORRITSB04241
dialogue.text: Could that mean... Yes, it must be time to eat at last!

dialogue.name: LOPORRITSB04241
dialogue.text: Oh, how I have waited for this moment! There's nothing like a carrot of happiness to fill the void in one's belly and soul...

dialogue.name: LOPORRITSC04241
dialogue.text: O carrot, my carrot, the prize we sought is won...

dialogue.name: LOPORRITSC04241
dialogue.text: Wh-Wh-Whaaat!? They're serving carrots of happiness today?

dialogue.name: LOPORRITSC04241
dialogue.text: The deep, luscious orange... That tempting, slender silhouette... Wait for me, my darlings─I'm coming for you!

dialogue.name: YAWNINGWAY
dialogue.text: Ah, you've returned... <yawn> And everyone else is accounted for. Sustenance is essential for us Loporrits...though I suppose people are the same.

dialogue.name: YAWNINGWAY
dialogue.text: In any case, we expend a lot of effort in raising a whole variety of carrots. Carrots of happiness are a new cultivar that are particularly...<yawn>...comforting, though.

dialogue.name: YAWNINGWAY
dialogue.text: Mmm...it seems almost silly to have our workers consume so many carrots just so that we can produce more carrots...

dialogue.name: YAWNINGWAY
dialogue.text: ...But that's a problem that can be solved with even more carrots!

dialogue.name: YAWNINGWAY
dialogue.text: No need to worry about the details─I'll work out the figures just as soon as...<yawn>... Hmm, what were we talking about?
